name: McBoeck
overview: McBoeck UG (h.b.) distributes chemical and fine chemical products in Africa, America and Asia Pacific. The company focuses on agro, food, industrial products, export, pharmaceuticals, perfumery/cosmetics, and veterinary and feed. It offers agrochemicals products, which include herbicides, fungicide, post harvest, micro nutrients, and amino acids; essetial oils, acidifiers, anticaking, functional starches, amminoacids, antioxidants, preservatives, malt derivatives, dairy products, sweeteners, enzymes, phosphates, herbs and spices, flavour enhancers, mineral salts, and vitamins; inorganic and organic chemicals; filtration, adsorption, and absorption products; solvents solutions; and specialty chemicals. The company also provides analgesics, antianxiety, platelet aggregation inhibitor, anti-asthmatic, antibacterial, topical and systemical antibiotic, antidepressant, antiepileptic, antihypertensive, antihystaminics, anti-inflammatory, antineoplÃ¡sicos, antipsychotic, antiviral, corticosteroid, diuretics, antidiabetic, serum lipid reducing agent, immune modulator, immunosuppressant, mucolitics, calcium regulators, intestinal traffic regulators, and vasodilator. In addition, it offers glicerines, propylenglycols, and aroma chemicals; and antibiotics, anticoccidials, antioxidants, pet palatability enhancers, soya protein concentrates, enzymes, excipients and anticaking agents, minerals and oligoelements, pigments, and medicated premixes. The company is based in Dassow, Germany (Hamburg Area).
